title: AQI trend tracking
description: Generate a line plot to track changes in local air quality index (AQI) over several months, using 'gray' to represent the AQI trend.
solution:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(df['date'], df['aqi'], color="gray", linewidth=2, marker='o')
plt.title("Hourly Electricity Consumption in an Industrial Park")
plt.xlabel("Date")
plt.ylabel("AQl")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
